summary: Overview of the deepagents library for building agents with planning, subagents, and file system capabilities to handle complex multi-step tasks.

structure.title: Deep Agents overview
structure.summary: Overview of deepagents library for building agents with planning, subagents, and file system capabilities for complex multi-step tasks.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > When to use deep agents
nodes.title: When to use deep agents
nodes.summary: Guidelines for using deep agents in complex scenarios requiring multi-step planning, large context management, delegation, and memory persistence.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > Core capabilities
nodes.title: Core capabilities
nodes.summary: Deep agents' core capabilities include task planning, context management, subagent spawning, and long-term memory for efficient AI workflows.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > Relationship to the LangChain ecosystem
nodes.title: Relationship to the LangChain ecosystem
nodes.summary: Deep agents is built on LangGraph for execution, LangChain for tools, and LangSmith for observability and deployment.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > Get started
nodes.title: Get started
nodes.summary: Introduction to getting started with Deep Agents, including quickstart, customization, middleware, and API reference.
